about_the_game:
A-Mazing 3D


One of our favorite childhood games was the tilting maze game in a wooden box. We decided to bring back that game and modernize it for today's maze playing fanatics!

This game teaches patience, balance and precise movement. The game includes several maze levels which are progressively harder the higher level maze you play.

Your objective is to try to tilt the playing field up, down, left and right using arrow keys to guide the steel marble to the end of the maze without letting it fall into any of the holes.

The closer you get to the finish, the higher your score becomes. The game allows for customizing the ball color, ball path, sound, and more.
detailed_description:
A-Mazing 3D


One of our favorite childhood games was the tilting maze game in a wooden box. We decided to bring back that game and modernize it for today's maze playing fanatics!

This game teaches patience, balance and precise movement. The game includes several maze levels which are progressively harder the higher level maze you play.

Your objective is to try to tilt the playing field up, down, left and right using arrow keys to guide the steel marble to the end of the maze without letting it fall into any of the holes.

The closer you get to the finish, the higher your score becomes. The game allows for customizing the ball color, ball path, sound, and more.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: X64 architecture
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 205 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12.6.8
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 205 MB available space

name: A-Mazing3D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 185 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 185 MB available space

Your objective is to try to tilt the playing field up, down, left and right to guide the marble to the end of the maze without letting it fall into any of the holes. The closer you get to the finish, the higher your score becomes.
